original_text: And the evil spirit from the Lord was upon Saul, as he sat in his house with his javelin in his hand: and David played with his hand.
korean_text: 사울이 손에 단창을 가지고 그의 집에 앉았을 때에 여호와께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 접하였으므로 다윗이 손으로 수금을 탈 때에

sentences.original_text: And the evil spirit from the Lord was upon Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호와께서 사울에게서 악한 영을 보내셨으니

sentences.original_text: as he sat in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 집에 앉아 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: with his javelin in his hand
and David played with his hand
